title: Recovery via IBC up in June quarter at 31.12%
description: In absolute terms, the realisation for creditors from the resolution of 58 stressed firms during the June quarter touched Rs 3,935 crore, according to the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Board of India (IBBI) data. The cumulative recovery from the 1,005 resolved cases until June 2024 stood at Rs 3.40 lakh crore.
